stories.title: Always-thorough discovery
stories.story: As a framework user, I want discovery to always perform full analysis so that I get a complete picture of my project without needing to know about flags.

stories.title: Agent orchestration visibility
stories.story: As a framework user running /discover on an agent-based project, I want the discovery to analyze markdown agent/command definitions so that the agent orchestration layer is visible in the discovery report.

stories.title: Better discovery presentation
stories.story: As a framework user, I want discovery output to use progress indicators and structured dashboards so that I can quickly understand the analysis results without reading walls of text.

stories.title: Guided post-discovery walkthrough
stories.story: As a framework user, I want a guided walkthrough after discovery completes so that I can review and customize the constitution, understand architecture decisions, configure iteration limits, and get context-aware next-step recommendations.

stories.title: Clean handover to SDLC workflows
stories.story: As a framework user, I want /discover to pass structured context to /sdlc workflows so that phase agents receive pre-filled context without re-analyzing discovery outputs.
